title: The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', but it changes with settings.
description: The title of hyperlink builder in the software is not behaving as expected.
OB: When clicking on 'OK' and then reopening the hyperlink builder, its title becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should remain consistent as 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Set a label for the hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on 'OK' and then reopen the hyperlink builder.
